I am not sure if this is a feature request, standard functionality or not possible at all but I just throw my idea into the group.

I have a working java 8 deployment. I want to install java on computer that I prefer, not for all the computer in the wsus group. If a approve the update for Optional Installation, the update is installed automatically instead of manually.

Should this be possible?
I can't remember exactly, but I think, Microsoft has changed the way "Optional updates" works. It doesn't behave like in Windows XP.
